doc:
Gary Albright https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gary_Albright 0 Gary Albright (May 18, 1963 – January 7, 2000) was an American professional wrestler who performed most notably for Stampede Wrestling in Canada with UWF International, and All Japan Pro Wrestling in Japan. Albright was a member through marriage of the famous Anoaʻi wrestling family, including Afa and Sika, Yokozuna, Rikishi, The Rock, Jimmy and Jey Uso, and Roman Reigns. His widow, Monica, is the daughter of Afa Anoaʻi. An established amateur wrestler, Albright made his professional wrestling debut in 1988 for Stampede Wrestling. From the early 1990s onward, Albright would participate as a talent almost exclusively for Japanese promotions focused on shoot aspects of professional wrestling as opposed to the worked sports entertainment. On January 7, 2000, Gary Albright collapsed in-ring upon receiving a three-quarter facelock bulldog from his opponent. Only minutes after being removed from the ring, Albright was pronounced dead. The cause of death was later ruled to be a heart attack. Gary_Albright ( May_18_,_1963 – January_7_,_2000 ) was an_American_professional_wrestler who performed most_notably for Stampede_Wrestling in Canada with UWF_International , and All_Japan_Pro_Wrestling in Japan . Albright was a_member through marriage of the_famous_Anoaʻi_wrestling_family , including Afa_and_Sika , Yokozuna , Rikishi , The_Rock , Jimmy and Jey_Uso , and Roman_Reigns . His_widow , Monica , is the_daughter of Afa_Anoaʻi . An_established_amateur_wrestler , Albright made his_professional_wrestling_debut in 1988 for Stampede_Wrestling . From the_early_1990s onward , Albright would_participate as a_talent almost_exclusively for Japanese_promotions focused on shoot_aspects of professional_wrestling as opposed to the_worked_sports_entertainment . On January_7_,_2000 , Gary_Albright collapsed in-ring upon receiving a_three-quarter_facelock_bulldog from his_opponent . Only_minutes after being_removed from the_ring , Albright was pronounced_dead . The_cause of death was_later_ruled_to_be a_heart_attack .
